name: Fairy Girl
description:
Every forest needs care. Caring for such an ancient forest is especially important. A fairy takes care of this forest, living in it in peace and harmony. She takes care of the forest and protects the forest dwellers and she heals the plants. But one day one plant got very sick and attacked the fairy...

Easy win: Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level

In the game, your goal is to collect the puzzle in order to restore the pictures.

FEATURES

  • ✨ Beautiful artwork
  • ✨ Animation scenes
  • ✨ CG Gallery Mode
  • ✨ Relaxing music
  • ✨ Puzzle game
